archimate:BusinessRole.name: Cloud Agent
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: An Agent that is hosted in the cloud. It typically operates on a computing device over which the Identity Owner does not have direct physical control or access. Mutually exclusive with Edge Agent. A Cloud Agent requires a Wallet and typically has a Service Endpoint. Cloud agents may be hosted by an Agency. See Appendix F.
